blocks.name: cfi
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the function whose value is the class of finite intersections of the elements of a given set.
blocks.origin: const class cfi { fi }

blocks.name: diff.cfi.s
diff.cfi.c
diff.cfi.w
df-fi
blocks.content: Function whose value is the class of finite intersections of the elements of the argument. Note that the empty intersection being the universal class, hence a proper class, it cannot be an element of that class. Therefore, the function value is the class of nonempty finite intersections of elements of the argument (see ~ elfi2 ). (Contributed by FL, 27-Apr-2008.)

blocks.name: fival
blocks.content: The set of all the finite intersections of the elements of ` A ` . (Contributed by FL, 27-Apr-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm fival(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cfi, c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cfi, c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  fvmptd3(hs0, cfi, c0, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))), universe, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  df-fi(hs0, s0, s1)
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))))
  rexeqdv(s1, cin(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))
  ineq1d(cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn, cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)
  elex(c0, c1)
  sylancr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))), universe), wss(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))), cpw(cuni(c0))), wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), universe))
  abssi(s0, cpw(cuni(c0)), wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))))
  rexlimiva(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cuni(c0))))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), cpw(cuni(c0))), wss(cv(s0), cuni(c0)))
  eqsstrd(cv(s0), cuni(c0), cint(cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1)))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))), wss(cint(cv(s1)), cuni(c0)), wss(cv(s1), c0), wne(cv(s1), emptycls))
  elpwid(cv(s1), c0, wcel(cv(s1), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)))
  elinel1(cv(s1), cpw(c0), cfn)
  sylibr(wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))), wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cint(cv(s1)), universe))
  eqvisset(s0, cint(cv(s1)))
  intex(cv(s1))
  intssuni2(cv(s1), c0)
  selpw(s0, cuni(c0))
  pwexd(cuni(c0), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  ssexg(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))), cpw(cuni(c0)), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(cv(s0), cint(cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cpw(cv(hs0)), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, cpw(c0), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cuni(c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cpw(cuni(c0)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cuni(c0))
  diff.cuni.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}

thm fival(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(fi ` c0)= { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1)})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(fi ` c0)= { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1)}), d(s1, c1))
  fvmptd3(hs0, cfi, c0, { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1)}, universe, { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(hs0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1)}, universe, c0 ‚àà c1)
  df-fi(hs0, s0, s1)
  abbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(hs0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1))
  rexeqdv(s1, (P(hs0)‚ãÇ Fin), (P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), hs0 = c0, s0 = ‚ãÇ s1)
  ineq1d(P(hs0), cfn, P(c0), hs0 = c0)
  pweq(hs0, c0)
  elex(c0, c1)
  sylancr(c0 ‚àà c1, { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1)} ‚àà ùïå, { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1)} ‚äÜ P(‚ãÉ c0), P(‚ãÉ c0)‚àà ùïå)
  abssi(s0, P(‚ãÉ c0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1))
  rexlimiva(s1, (P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1, s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ c0))
  sylibr((s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚àß s0 = ‚ãÇ s1), s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ c0), s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqsstrd(s0, ‚ãÉ c0, ‚ãÇ s1, (s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)‚àß s0 = ‚ãÇ s1))
  simpr(s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1)
  syl2an(s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1, ‚ãÇ s1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c0, s1 ‚äÜ c0, s1 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  elpwid(s1, c0, s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin))
  elinel1(s1, P(c0), cfn)
  sylibr(s0 = ‚ãÇ s1, s1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, ‚ãÇ s1 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqvisset(s0, ‚ãÇ s1)
  intex(s1)
  intssuni2(s1, c0)
  selpw(s0, ‚ãÉ c0)
  pwexd(‚ãÉ c0, universe, c0 ‚àà c1)
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  ssexg({ s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1)}, P(‚ãÉ c0), universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà(P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), s0 = ‚ãÇ s1)})
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cin.s(s1, P(hs0), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cin.s(s1, P(c0), cfn)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cfn.s(s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, ‚ãÉ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, P(‚ãÉ c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)

blocks.name: elfi
blocks.content: Specific properties of an element of ` ( fi `` B ) ` . (Contributed by FL, 27-Apr-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfi, c2)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cfi, c2)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  sylan9bbr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, cfv(cfi, c2)), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cab(hs0, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0)))))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cfi, c2), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0))))), wcel(c2, c3))
  fival(hs0, s0, c2, c3)
  elabg(hs0, c0, c1, wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0)))))
  rexbidv(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cint(cv(s0))), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cint(cv(s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c2), cfn), wceq(c0, cint(cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0 ‚àà(fi ` c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c2)‚ãÇ Fin), c0 = ‚ãÇ s0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c0 ‚àà(fi ` c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c2)‚ãÇ Fin), c0 = ‚ãÇ s0))), d(s0, c1))
  sylan9bbr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà(fi ` c2), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c2)‚ãÇ Fin), c0 = ‚ãÇ s0), c0 ‚àà { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c2)‚ãÇ Fin), hs0 = ‚ãÇ s0)})
  eleq2d(c0, (fi ` c2), { hs0 | ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c2)‚ãÇ Fin), hs0 = ‚ãÇ s0)}, c2 ‚àà c3)
  fival(hs0, s0, c2, c3)
  elabg(hs0, c0, c1, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c2)‚ãÇ Fin), hs0 = ‚ãÇ s0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c2)‚ãÇ Fin), c0 = ‚ãÇ s0))
  rexbidv(s0, (P(c2)‚ãÇ Fin), hs0 = c0, hs0 = ‚ãÇ s0, c0 = ‚ãÇ s0)
  eqeq1(hs0, c0, ‚ãÇ s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà(P(c2)‚ãÇ Fin), c0 = ‚ãÇ s0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elfi2
blocks.content: The empty intersection need not be considered in the set of finite intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elfi2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(cfi, c0)), wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cfi, c0)), wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c2, cfv(cfi, c0)), wcel(c2, universe)))
  elex(c2, cfv(cfi, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, universe)))
  rexlimiva(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wcel(c2, universe))
  eqeltrd(c2, universe, cint(cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), universe), wne(cv(s0), emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wne(cv(s0), emptycls))
  eldifsni(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), emptycls)
  intex(cv(s0))
  expcom(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(cfi, c0)), wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cfi, c0)), wrex(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))))
  elfi(s0, c2, universe, c0, c1)
  rexbidv2(s0, cin(cpw(c0), cfn), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  3bitr4g(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn))), wa(wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)))))
  pm5.32da(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))))
  syl6bbr(wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))))
  biantrud(wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls))))
  nsyl3(wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), universe))
  mtbiri(wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)), wcel(cint(cv(s0)), universe), wcel(universe, universe))
  vprc()
  eleq1d(cint(cv(s0)), universe, universe, wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))
  syl6eq(cint(cv(s0)), universe, cint(emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))
  inteqd(cv(s0), emptycls, wcel(cv(s0), csn(emptycls)))
  elsni(cv(s0), emptycls)
  int0()
  eqeltrrd(cint(cv(s0)), universe, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0)))))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  simpll(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  eldif(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), cin(cpw(c0), cfn)), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls))), wceq(c2, cint(cv(s0))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

thm elfi2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(fi ` c0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), c2 = ‚ãÇ s0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà(fi ` c0), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), c2 = ‚ãÇ s0), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ‚àà(fi ` c0)‚Üí c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  elex(c2, (fi ` c0))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), c2 = ‚ãÇ s0)‚Üí c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  rexlimiva(s0, ((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), c2 = ‚ãÇ s0, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqeltrd(c2, universe, ‚ãÇ s0, (s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ })‚àß c2 = ‚ãÇ s0))
  simpr(s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), c2 = ‚ãÇ s0)
  sylib((s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ })‚àß c2 = ‚ãÇ s0), ‚ãÇ s0 ‚àà ùïå, s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  adantr(s0 ‚àà((P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin)\ { ‚àÖ }), c2 = ‚ãÇ s0, s0 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  eldifsni(s0, (P(c0)‚ãÇ Fin), emptycls)

thm intrnfi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wf(c2, c3, c0), wne(c3, emptycls), wcel(c3, cfn))), wss(crn(c2), c0), wne(crn(c2), emptycls), wcel(crn(c2), cfn))
  frnd(c2, c0, c3, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wf(c2, c3, c0), wne(c3, emptycls), wcel(c3, cfn))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wf(c2, c3, c0), wne(c3, emptycls), wcel(c3, cfn))), wne(crn(c2), emptycls), wne(cdm(c2), emptycls))
  eqnetrd(cdm(c2), emptycls, c3, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wf(c2, c3, c0), wne(c3, emptycls), wcel(c3, cfn))))
  fdmd(c2, c3, c0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wf(c2, c3, c0), wne(c3, emptycls), wcel(c3, cfn))))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c3, c0), wne(c3, emptycls), wcel(c3, cfn))
  necon3bii(cdm(c2), emptycls, crn(c2), emptycls)
  dm0rn0(c2)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wf(c2, c3, c0), wne(c3, emptycls), wcel(c3, cfn))), wcel(crn(c2), cfn), wcel(c3, cfn), wfo(c2, c3, crn(c2)))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c3, c0), wne(c3, emptycls), wcel(c3, cfn))

blocks.name: iinfi
blocks.content: An indexed intersection of elements of ` C ` is an element of the finite intersections of ` C ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)

thm iinfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

} = {
  eqeltrd(ciin(s0, c2, c3), cfv(cfi, c0), cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn))))
  syl6eqr(ciin(s0, c2, c3), cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), cint(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn))), wceq(ciin(s0, c2, c3), cint(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn))
  dfiin2g(s0, hs0, c2, c3, c0)
  inteqi(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3)), cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c2, c3)
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn)), wcel(cint(crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))), cfv(cfi, c0)), w3a(wf(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c2, c0), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn)))
  3anbi1i(wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c0)), wne(c2, emptycls), wcel(c2, cfn), wf(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c2, c0))
  fmpt(s0, c2, c3, c0, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))

blocks.name: dffi2
blocks.content: The set of finite intersections is the smallest set that contains ` A ` and is closed under pairwise intersection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: inficl
blocks.content: A set which is closed under pairwise intersection is closed under finite intersection. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.)

thm inficl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wceq(cfv(cfi, c0), c0)))

  elabg(hs0, c0, c1, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))))
  bitr3d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))
  biantrurd(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))
  eqimss2(cv(hs0), c0)

  raleqbi1dv(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0))

  intss1(c0, cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0)))))))
  sseq1d(cfv(cfi, c0), c0, cint(cab(hs0, wa(wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))))))), wcel(c0, c1))

blocks.name: fipwuni
blocks.content: The set of finite intersections of a set is contained in the powerset of the union of the elements of ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fipwuni(class c0) {
  |- wss(cfv(cfi, c0), cpw(cuni(c0)))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wss(cfv(cfi, c0), cpw(cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  sseqtrd(cfv(cfi, c0), cpw(cuni(c0)), cfv(cfi, cpw(cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, universe), wss(cfv(cfi, c0), cfv(cfi, cpw(cuni(c0)))), wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), universe), wss(c0, cpw(cuni(c0))))
  pwuni(c0)
  fiss(cpw(cuni(c0)), universe, c0)
  mpbii(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cfv(cfi, cpw(cuni(c0))), cpw(cuni(c0))), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(c0)), wral(hs1, cpw(cuni(c0)), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpw(cuni(c0))))))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, cpw(cuni(c0)), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpw(cuni(c0))))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cuni(c0))), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpw(cuni(c0))))
  3imtr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cuni(c0))), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpw(cuni(c0))), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wss(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)))
  ssinss1(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cv(hs1))
  elpw(cv(hs0), cuni(c0))
  elpw(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cuni(c0))
  inex1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  syl(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(c0)), wral(hs1, cpw(cuni(c0)), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpw(cuni(c0))))), wceq(cfv(cfi, cpw(cuni(c0))), cpw(cuni(c0)))), wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), universe))
  pwexd(cuni(c0), universe, wcel(c0, universe))
  uniexg(c0, universe)
  inficl(hs0, hs1, cpw(cuni(c0)), universe)
  syl6eqss(cfv(cfi, c0), cpw(cuni(c0)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))

  0ss(cpw(cuni(c0)))

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cuni(c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
}

blocks.name: fiuni
blocks.content: The union of the finite intersections of a set is simply the union of the set itself. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: fipwss
blocks.content: If a set is a family of subsets of some base set, then so is its finite intersection. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fipwss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cfv(cfi, c0), cpw(c1)))
} = {
  pm2.61ian(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cfv(cfi, c0), cpw(c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cfv(cfi, c0), cpw(c1)))
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, universe), wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cfv(cfi, c0), cpw(c1)), wss(cuni(c0), c1), wss(cuni(cfv(cfi, c0)), c1))
  sseq1d(cuni(c0), c1, cuni(cfv(cfi, c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  fiuni(c0, universe)
  sspwuni(c0, c1)
  sspwuni(cfv(cfi, c0), c1)
  adantr(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wss(cfv(cfi, c0), cpw(c1)))
  syl6eqss(cfv(cfi, c0), cpw(c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, cfi)
  0ss(cpw(c1))
}

thm fipwss(class c0, class c1) {

  biimpa(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚äÜ P(c1), (fi ` c0)‚äÜ P(c1))
  3bitr4g(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚äÜ P(c1), (fi ` c0)‚äÜ P(c1), ‚ãÉ c0 ‚äÜ c1, ‚ãÉ(fi ` c0)‚äÜ c1)
  sseq1d(‚ãÉ c0, c1, ‚ãÉ(fi ` c0), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fiuni(c0, universe)
  sspwuni(c0, c1)
  sspwuni((fi ` c0), c1)
  adantr(¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚äÜ P(c1), (fi ` c0)‚äÜ P(c1))

}

blocks.name: elfiun
blocks.content: A finite intersection of elements taken from a union of collections. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 15-Nov-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: dffi3
blocks.content: The set of finite intersections can be "constructed" inductively by iterating binary intersection ` _om ` -many times. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: fifo
blocks.content: Describe a surjection from nonempty finite sets to finite intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fifo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), cfv(cfi, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), cint(cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wfo(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), cfv(cfi, c0)), wfo(c2, cdif(cin(cpw(c0), cfn), csn(emptycls)), crn(c2)))
